Package com.ibm.lpex.alef

This package provides advanced line-oriented editing functions, for the use of IBM Eclipse Platform plugins.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ILpexSourceViewerConfiguration An interface for defining the capabilities of an LPEX source viewer configuration.
 

Class Summary
LpexAbstractTextEditor A line oriented, LPEX-based abstract default implementation of ITextEditor.
LpexContextContributor Basic LPEX contributions to the Eclipse context.
LpexEditorPart LpexEditorPart is the superclass of the line-oriented, LPEX-based editor parts.
LpexPlugin Minimal plugin runtime class for LPEX.
LpexSourceViewer A line-oriented, LPEX-based partial implementation of com.ibm.jface.text.source.ISourceViewer.
LpexSourceViewerConfiguration A generic implementation of ILpexSourceViewerConfiguration.
LpexTextEditor A default line-oriented, LPEX-based text editor for IFile resources.
LpexTextViewer A line-oriented, LPEX-based partial implementation of com.ibm.jface.text.ITextViewer.
LpexVerticalRuler Default implementation of IVerticalRuler for LpexTextViewer.
 

Package com.ibm.lpex.alef Description

This package provides advanced line-oriented editing functions, for the use of IBM Eclipse Platform plugins.
